error.irc_reconect: Authentication failed. Refreshing token and trying again...
error.authorization_refused: You refused access to the Twitch application.
error.csrf_failed: An error occured while generating a CSRF token
error.obs_ws_connect: Unable to connect with OBS. Double check the port and password and make sure you have OBS 28+
error.twitch_auth_fail: An error occurred when connecting with Twitch
error.twitch_poll_delete: An error occurred while deleting the poll
error.twitch_prediction_delete: An error occurred while deleting the prediction
error.load_user_ban: Unable to load ban user states: {ERROR}
error.auto_shoutout: You have not been raided yet
error.commercial_start: An error occured when starting the commercial: {DETAILS}
error.user_profile: Something went wrong while loading user's profile...
error.donor_loading: An error occured when loading donors list :(
error.cmd_missing_api: This command cannot be used outside of official Twitch chat yet :(
error.no_pin_api: Twitch doesn't allow to pin messages outside of official Twitch chat yet.
error.rewards_loading: An error occurred while loading your rewards
error.obs_scenes_loading: An error occurred while loading your OBS scenes
error.obs_sources_loading: An error occurred while loading your OBS sources
error.room_settings_update: An error occured when updating room's settings
error.mod_message: Something went wrong when moderating the message...
error.marker_creation: Marker creation failed. Make sure you enabled VOD and that you're live
error.trigger_socket: Unable to connect to socket server
error.shoutout_offline: You must be live to make a shoutout
error.shoutout_pending: This user already has a pending shoutout
error.shoutout_not_mod: You're not a moderator on this channel

spotify.no_device: [SPOTIFY] You must first start playing something on Spotify for Twitchat to be able to control it.

error.message_send: Woops... something went wrong when sending the message :(
error.prediction_outcome: An error occurred while chosing prediction's outcome
error.prediction_delete: An error occurred while deleting the prediction
error.shoutout_cooldown: You need to wait a little before doing another shoutout
error.beta_transfer: An error occured when transfering your data to production

raffle.pick_winner_no_raffle: You must start a raffle before picking a winner
raffle.pick_winner_no_subs: You cannot start a raffle amongst your subs. No user is subscribed to your channel at the moment.

error.youtube_denied: You refused to grant access to your YouTube account
error.patreon_denied: You refused to grant access to your Patreon profile
error.patreon_disconected: Your Patreon account has been disconected
error.badge_file_loading_failed: Something went wrong loading the given image
error.max_custom_usernames: You've reached the maximum of {COUNT} custom user name count you can set. Become premium to set up to 10000 custom user names.
error.max_custom_badges: You've reached the maximum of {COUNT} custom badges you can create. Become premium to create up to 100 custom badges.
error.max_custom_badges_given: You've reached the maximum of {COUNT} users with custom badges. Become premium to give custom badges to up to 10000 users.
error.max_custom_heat_screen: You've reached the maximum of {COUNT} custom heat screens. Become premium to create up to 100 custom screens.
error.max_values: You've reached the maximum of {COUNT} values. Become premium to create up to 100 values.

paypal.GIFTED_USER_NOT_FOUND: The user you're making the gift to was not found.
paypal.paypal_create_order_failure: Something went wrong when creating PayPal order
paypal.paypal_order_failure: Something went wrong when processing your payment or registering you as a donor. Please contact me {EMAIL} to get things sorted out

error.heat_areas_limit: You reached the maximum of 100 clickable areas
error.rate_limit: You are being rate limited. Wait a minute and try again.
error.rate_limit_ban: You have been banned from server after a suspicious activity. Come back later or contact me at {MAIL}.
error.no_translation: No translation found for this message :(
error.quota_translation: You reached the maximum translation amount for today
error.youtube_connect_expired: Your YouTube session has expired. Please reconnect.
error.youtube_api_is_shit_unban: Because YouTube API is extremely poorly made, you cannot unban this user from Twitchat anymore. Go on your Youtube channel to unban them or ask one of your moderators to unban them.
error.youtube_message_delete: Something went wrong when deleting the YouTube message
error.youtube_message_post: Something went wrong when posting message on YouTube
error.youtube_no_broadcast:
Selected account is not allowed to live stream on YouTube.
Make sure you connected with the right account!
error.youtube_no_credits:
All API credits allocated by YouTube have been used¬†:(.
YouTube will work again tomorrow.
error.youtube_chat_off: Chat is not enabled on the selected YouTube live broadcast
error.youtube_chat_ended: YouTube broadcast has ended. Open parameters => YouTube section to connect to a new live session.
error.youtube_chat_not_found: Requested YouTube broadcast does not exist anymore.
error.youtube_unknown: An unexpected error occured when requesting data from YouTube :(
error.youtube_connect: An unexpected error occured when connecting with YouTube :(

rewards.create_unknown: Something went wrong when creating the reward
rewards.edit_unknown: Something went wrong when editing the reward
rewards.CREATE_CUSTOM_REWARD_DUPLICATE_REWARD: A reward with this name already exists
rewards.refund_redemption:
Something went wrong when refunding redemption.
Redemption may have already been refund.

error.ad_block:
Disable your Ad-blockers üôè.
They block Ad notifications and /commercial command, and randomly cuts connection to chat.

Twitchat is ad-free and does not collect any personnal or analytic data.

discord.UNKNOWN: An unexpected error occured when posting to Discord :(
discord.INVALID_USER: You are not allowed to use this code
discord.MISSING_ACCESS: Twitchat bot does not have permission to write on Discord channel "{CHANNEL}"
discord.MISSING_ACCESS_THREAD:
Twitchat bot does not have permission to create threads on Discord channel "{CHANNEL}".
Make sure the bot also has "Read Message History" permission.

error.streamlabs_denied: You refused access to your Streamlabs profile.
error.tipeee_denied: You refused access to your Tipeee profile.
error.tiltify_denied: You refused access to your Tiltify profile.
error.kofi_connect_failed: Something went wrong when connecting to Ko-fi.
error.kofi_disconnect_failed: Something went wrong when disconnecting from Ko-fi.
error.lumia_connect_failed:
Connection to Lumia Stream failed.
Make sure Lumia Stream is started and token is valid.
error.streamelements_denied: You refused access to your Streamelements profile.
error.bingo_grid_404: Bingo grid not found or disabled
error.twitch_bot_connect_failed: Failed connecting to your Twitch bot account
error.qna_action: Something went wrong when performing requested Q&A moderation action
error.spoil_action: Something went wrong when asking to spoil the message on streamer's chat
error.sse_error:
Failed establishing connexion to live events, {APP} may not work properly.
Disable all adblockers for this page and try reloading it.
error.patreon_max_linked: You cannot link more than 2 Twitch accounts to the same Patreon account
error.streamSocket_connect_failed:
Could not connect with Twitch extension.
Make sure you installed it on your channel and that you set proper secret.
